articles.title: A FIFTH of Americans believe in COVID-19 vaccination misinformation including that it alters DNA - nation.lk - The Nation Newspaper
articles.description: A Harvard University study finds that one out of every five Americans believes at least one piece of vaccine misinformation. Lies about vaccines have become rampant on social media over the past months.
articles.content:
One-fifth of Americans believe at least one common piece of misinformation about the COVID-19 vaccines, a new study finds.
